attributes.title: Just horrid.
attributes.review: I CANâ€™T BELIEVE I AM SAYING THIS, BUT THIS APP IS JUST HORRID. INSTALLING THIS WAS... A WASTE OF TIME, I APOLOGIZE TO MY FELLOW REPUBLICANS BUT GOSH DARN IT, IT HAD TO BE SAID. THIS APP, IT IRKS ME. I DOWNLOAD IT AND ALL OF A SUDDEN MY PHONE IS FILLED WITH VIRUSES AND I CAN ONLY TYPE IN ALL CAPS NOW. WHAT A SHAME, NOW MY POOR TRUMP-OBSESSED 10-YEAR OLD THINKS IM YELLING AT HIM WHENEVER I TEXT HIM TO STOP TAKING SO LONG IN THE SHOWER, ITâ€™S STRANGE THOUGH BECAUSE HE ALWAYS BRINGS A PICTURE OF OUR BELOVED PRESIDENT INTO THE BATHROOM AND I FIND THIS WEIRD SUBSTANCE ON THE SHOWER WALL WHEN HE GETS OUT. ANYWAYS, SILLY ME RANTING ON, I AM A WOMAN SO I GUESS THAT TENDS TO HAPPEN, BUT TAKE MY WORD, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
